snippet.title: Alliance of Valiant Arms Comes to En Masse
snippet.description:
We are happy to announce that En Masse Entertainment is the new publisher for AVA—Alliance of Valiant Arms!

AVA is a fast-paced, free-to-play team FPS with nearly a decade of history and a vast global community.

Visit http://ava.enmasse.com for more information about AVA's upcoming betas and to join the discussion on the new AVA forums.
